title: [1.10.2-1.7.10][生存微调——SurvivalTweaks] 双持？who care？
author: zhuqinghe
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zhuqinghe 于 2017-4-25 22:06 编辑 

一些废话
有比搬运的模组没人看更悲催的事吗？当然有，那就是自己用心做的整合也没人看{:10_522:}


模组功能
一个超实用的原版微调模组，功能如下

手持剑右键格挡可减半伤害，如果格挡时还处于潜行状态，可以无视一次伤害箭右键可扔出，距离五格，二伤害手持防具右键可穿戴或替换装备中的防具。手持工具右键方块时，会放置在工具对应快捷栏左右两边的可放置方块，右边优先级高于左边。如果在潜行状态，且手持的工具可挖掘鼠标所指方块时，会挖掘且放置在工具对应快捷栏左右两边的可放置方块，右边优先级高于左边（会消耗耐久）。睡眠可消除所有牛奶可消除的药水状态并回复20生命，同时睡眠也会消耗5格饱食度力量药水可增强弓箭的射程和伤害，衰弱药水反之跳跃增强药水可以给玩家带来自动上坡的效果在末地使用末影珍珠可以免受伤害、创造模式也可以使用末影珍珠创造模式中在潜行状态下使用末影之眼可以直接传送到要塞挖掉地狱岩和石英后会出现自动扩散的岩浆（默认关闭）破坏灵魂沙会导致一定时间的虚弱状态破坏地狱砖会导致玩家受到一定伤害玩家可撞击生物（默认关闭）可使用维度间的传送命令
/tpd list - List the dimension ids, name, and the one you are currectly in
/tpd <Dimension Id> - Teleports you to that dimension 
/tpd <Dimension Id> <x> <z>- Teleports you to that dimension at that x and z coordinate
/tpd <Dimension Id> <x> <y> <z>- Teleports you to that dimension at that x, y, and z coordinate
/tpd <Player Name> <Dimension Id> - Teleport that player to that dimension
/tpd <Player Name> <Dimension Id> <x> <z>- Teleport that player to that dimension at that x and z coordinate
/tpd <Player Name> <Dimension Id> <x> <y> <z>-  Teleport that player to that dimension at that x, y, and z coordinate
/tpd <First Player Name> <Second Player Name> - Teleport the first player to the second player, regardless of their current dimension复制代码



可定制性
# Configuration file

# Configuration file

general {
    # Allow armor swapping via right-clicking [default: true]右键穿戴装备
    B:"Armor Swap"=true

    # Player can shot Arrows without the need for a Bow [default: true]投掷箭
    B:"Arrow Throw"=true

    # Strength potions allows player to shoot arrows farer [default: true]力量药水的远程影响
    B:"Bow Boost"=true

    # Burn entities when they step on Netherrack or Quartz Ore [default: false]生物站在地狱岩和石英上是否会燃烧
    B:"Burn Entities"=false

    # Effects with these IDs will be cleared when the player sleeps [default: ]可以被床清空的药水效果
    S:"Effects Cleared by Bed" <
     >

    # Allow players to use Ender Pearls in Creative mode [default: true]创造模式的末影珍珠效果
    B:"Ender Pearl in Creative"=true

    # Breaking certain blocks from the Nether cause the player to get negative potion effect [default: true]破坏灵魂沙是否有负面效果
    B:"Nether Block Effect"=true

    # Ender Pearls used in the End will cause no fall damage [default: true]末影珍珠调整
    B:"No Ender Pearl damage in End"=true

    # Add collision check to the player [default: false]玩家冲撞效果
    B:"Player Collision"=false

    # Sleeping will remove all potion effects from the player and heal them by 20 hearts (will reduce hunger when it happens) [default: true]睡眠恢复
    B:"Sleep Restoration"=true

    # Spawn lava when Netherrack or Quartz Ore is mined [default: true]地狱岩和石英是否留下岩浆
    B:"Spawn Lava"=true

    # Jump potions grant players a step boost [default: true]跳跃增强是否有自动上坡效果
    B:"Step Assist"=true

    # Teleports a Creative mode player to a Stronghold when they uses the Eye of Ender while sneaking [default: true]创造模式的末影眼球效果
    B:"Stronghold Teleport"=true

    # Blocking with the sword will cut the damage in half at the cost of durability [default: true]格挡增强
    B:"Sword as Shield"=true

    # Tools will be able to place blocks located to the right/left of them in the hotbar [default: true]右键放置
    B:"Tools Block Place"=true
}

下载地址
请优先支持原作者
http://mods.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/233677-survival-tweaks
备份
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1hrXKso0

replies.author: liux135
replies.txt_content:
此mod1.7.10有bug
多人局域网联机会造成主机血量被强行固定为其他玩家的血量
 其他玩家血量越少你也越少，当其他玩家受到攻击，你的屏幕也会晃动并扣血
 别的玩家死了，你也会死，但你并没有死。所以你只能退出游戏，重新进。
